评论详情: These are very nice. The leather is medium stiff, not difficult to break in. They are lined in a soft leather. I typically wear an 8.5 but ordered a 9 in these as I am used to wearing wide toe shoes like Doc Martens (which I typically wear an 8 in). The size 9 leave a thumb’s width of space from my big toe, and the large toe ball joint sits at the widest part when the shoe “breaks” when walking. They are comfortable and arrived in a high end box with specially formed shape keepers and shoe bags. Looking forward to wearing them for business travel coming up.
Just what I was looking for as far as style and quality

Takes some time to break in cause it seems to be real leather just thin. I’d say after about a week they start to get very comfortable. I needed something professional that I could get toe deflection in since I’m a flight instructor.
Out of the box I loved them! Only wore them once so far but very comfortable and are true to size.
These shoes are extremely well made and are both elegant and substantial.  I ordered my usual size and they fit perfectly. The shoe covers are a bonus!

评论概述: Beautiful shoe, with room for insole
评论详情: well made, really good looking shoe.
I had to go up a whole size but they are super cute and feel like good quality

Fue una buena sorpresa estos zapatos, la primera experiencia con esta marca, la comodidad es completa, los pies se mantienen seguros y firmes al dar el paso, son estables, el color del cuero es uniformey el estilo es el que buscaba. Estoy muy feliz con esta compra!!
Well made true fit

I have spent more than this amount on shoes and never received the shoe bags and foam shoe inserts that came with this pair.  Extremely comfortable and very high quality materials in the making of the shoes. I’ll be looking through the stores website for other styles.  Great value for ride cost.
Love these shoes!!! These are well made, true to size, and worth every penny.  They are similar to my Bass shoes that have lasted over a decade!  Get these..they are a good investment!
Very comfortable. Happy with my purchase
Great

评论详情: Color “Brown-new”: is a keeper.  Very comfortable and hugs my foot nicely.  Feels amazing!  I tried two and kept this one because the leather on this color was much more supple and comfortable.  A great classic style shoe at a good price point.These fit true to size, I bought the same size that I wear for Clark’s and it was a perfect fit.
Good quality, comfortable, non slip. Everything i needed.
The shoes were nicely made, but I did not keep them as they just weren’t a good fit. I returned them to Amazon the day after I received them.
Perfect fit. Good quality. Comfortable. And really cute!
N/a

There are only likes about this Shoe, nice leather, love the wingtip and most of all the square toe which allows the absolute all day comfort!! Bought both black and brown and would love to see some booties this style in the future!
These are gorgeous but unfortunately way too stiff. My feet hurts after a ten minutes walk to the subway station. Returned. But what a pity!

Nice design, stiff leather typical for Oxfords, but even with laces tightened, these shoes slip out at the heel when walking - dangerous trip hazard.... awkward too.  European and American shoes always fit better.  Very disappointed that I had to return these.
